title: arno Pro but numbers with ascenders?
content:
I am looking for the version of arno pro that has the numbers show up like on the third row of this graphic here:

[http://www.tdc.org/news/2007Results/Arno.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725003950/http:/www.tdc.org/news/2007Results/Arno.html "http://www.tdc.org/news/2007Results/Arno.html")

they look like ascending letters

Thanks
author: mirimiri2

comments.content: It is an OpenType feature inbuilt in the typeface that you will find in InDesign for example. Go to the OpenType meny and choose Old Style Figures.
Thanks, I did not know about these open type features!
